trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around June 10th 1998
divs: Sighting DetailsWe had just gotten out of work and we were walking down a boardwalk just after dusk looking toward the Tampa International Airport about six miles away from it. We were actually discussing a U.F.O experience when I looked up and noticed a light hovering in the distance but not too far away. To answer all of the non-believers and liars: It was not an electomagnetic force from under us; it was not a plane or helicopter or Saturn or whatever else excuse you can make up this time. You should notice at this point that I am quite verbose or at least affluent in language and therefore thought and assumption or assertion of unusual occurrences. So the object hovered for a brief time, then moved left, then right, then up then down, then at an unusual speed progessed to the south faster than any human body could adjust to or handle. So: A copy of a crashed craft? There is more here than that because of the speed. That's all, Drew.
Summary: This object appeared to be a conventional light, no different than a plane or helicopter. As soon as we can figure out how an object travels at 12 G's we will understand this one.
